whyUs.title: Your Website as a Business Asset
whyUs.subtitle: Strategic design and professional photography that deliver real results.

reason1.title: Strategy-Driven Design
reason1.description: Licensed Designers and Marketers. Built to convert (CRO). We deliver a strategic digital asset, not just a pretty website.

reason2.title: 100% Local Service
reason2.description: Direct service, no intermediaries. We know your market (D√©nia & Marina Alta). Real proximity and commitment.

reason3.title: Instant Visual Credibility
reason3.description: Professional Photography Included. Authentic images (not generic stock) that build trust immediately. Your brand will look professional instantly.

reason4.title: Guaranteed Delivery Times
reason4.description: Guaranteed Speed. Photo editing and project tracking in 24-48 hours. On-time delivery without sacrificing quality.

reason5.title: Total Satisfaction Guarantee
reason5.description: Protected Investment. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. FREE re-edits (up to 3 times) so you love the result.

reason6.title: Post-Launch Support
reason6.description: Proactive Support Post-Launch. Continuous strategic maintenance. Your website always secure, updated and running perfectly.

portfolio.title: Industries We Work With
portfolio.subtitle: Experience in multiple industries with real results
portfolio.footerText: Your industry not listed? We work with any type of business

result1.title: CRO-Based Strategic Design
result1.description: We don't design for aesthetics. Every visual element is optimized to maximize conversions through CRO (Conversion Rate Optimization) techniques backed by user psychology.

result2.title: Premium User Experience
result2.description: Smooth animations, fluid transitions and micro-interactions that elevate perceived value. Your website will feel like a $5,000+ product, not a generic template.

result3.title: Content Strategy Included
result3.description: Persuasive copy, clear visual hierarchy and strategically placed calls-to-action. Every word works to sell your value proposition.

process1.title: Analysis and Strategy
process1.description: We study your market, competition and target audience to create a winning digital strategy from the start.

process3.title: Post-Launch Tracking
process3.description: We don't abandon you after launch. We monitor performance and continuously optimize to improve results.

stickyScroll.priceDisclaimer: This is the cost of our Basic Plan. Request a quote for our strategic design services with advanced CRO and smooth animations.
stickyScroll.whatsappMessage: Hello, I want to request a custom quote for a professional website with strategic design
stickyScroll.maintenanceDescription: After creating your website, we offer a monthly maintenance service to keep it secure, updated and running perfectly. You'll never have to call an emergency developer. Cost varies based on your needs (updates, support, backups). Ask us without obligation!
stickyScroll.legalDisclaimer: All prices include VAT. Domain and hosting managed separately.

process.title: How We Work With You
process.subtitle: Simple and transparent process in 3 steps

step1.title: Tell Us Your Project
step1.description: We chat with you to understand what you need: website, photography, or both. No technical jargon, just clear solutions.

step2.title: We Create Your Solution
step2.description: We design your website and/or conduct the photo session. We work with you until it's perfect.

step3.title: We Launch and Support You
step3.description: We publish your project and teach you how to manage it. We remain available for whatever you need.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real testimonials from businesses that trusted us

testimonial1.name: Mar√≠a G.
testimonial1.text: I hired the photography service for my real estate agency and the photos turned out amazing. Every property looks much better with professionally edited images. Clients congratulate me on the quality.

testimonial2.name: Robert M.
testimonial2.text: I needed a professional website for my vertical service company. The team delivered an excellent bilingual site that works perfectly. Very responsive and professional.

testimonial3.name: Ana L.
testimonial3.text: At first I didn't give much importance to having a website for my gym, but I was surprised by the number of people who contact us through it. Now it's my best customer acquisition tool.
